SATurn

11 months ago

SATurn is both the name of the application development framework (see the Internal: Developer Guide section for more information) and the name of the bioinformatics web-portal which we created for use at the SGC. Within the SGC we store all of our samples within an Oracle database using a LIMS system called Scarab. We have deployed a version of the SATurn bioinformatics portal on our internal servers which is connected to our Oracle database which users access via their web-browsers to perform construct design and basic bioinformatics tasks.

We have created a standalone version of this bioinformatics portal which can be installed onto
